meanings.definition: The highest part of a tree.
meanings.sent1: Birds chirped happily in the treetops.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel leaped from treetop to treetop.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got stuck in the treetops again!
meanings.sent4: The sunlight filtered through the treetops like golden ribbons.
meanings.sent5: The wind whispered secrets as it rustled the treetops.

meanings.definition: The uppermost branches of a tree.
meanings.sent1: The monkeys swung playfully from the treetops.
meanings.sent2: The leaves danced in the breeze at the treetops.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat climbed to the treetops to escape the dog.
meanings.sent4: The moon peeked shyly through the treetops at night.
meanings.sent5: The storm howled through the treetops, bending them with its force.
